mapper.select: SELECT empl_idx, empl_name FROM employee WHERE empl_id=#{param1}
SELECT ap.dept_idx FROM appointment AS ap JOIN employee AS empl ON ap.appo_idx = empl.appolast_idx WHERE empl.empl_id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_room(room_name,room_addr, room_empl_idx, room_info, room_min, room_max) VALUES(#{room_name}, #{room_addr}, #{room_empl_idx}, #{room_info}, #{room_min}, #{room_max})

mapper.select: SELECT mr.room_idx, mr.room_name, mr.room_addr, mr.room_empl_idx, mr.room_info, mr.file_key, mr.room_min, mr.room_max, e.empl_name FROM meeting_room mr INNER JOIN employee e ON mr.room_empl_idx = e.empl_idx WHERE mr.room_idx = #{room_idx}
SELECT ori_filename, new_filename FROM file WHERE file_key = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting_room SET room_name=#{room_name}, room_addr=#{room_addr}, room_info=#{room_info}, room_min=#{room_min}, room_max=#{room_max} WHERE room_idx=#{room_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(meet_rent_idx) FROM meeting_rent WHERE room_idx=#{room_idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file WHERE uploader_idx=#{param1} AND new_filename=#{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT mt.meet_rent_idx, mr.room_idx, mr.room_name, mt.meet_rent_empl_idx, mt.meet_subject, mt.meet_content, mt.meet_start_date, mt.meet_end_date FROM meeting_rent mt JOIN meeting_room mr ON mt.room_idx=mr.room_idx WHERE mr.room_idx=#{room_idx}

SELECT empl.empl_idx, mp.meet_parti_empl_idx, empl.empl_name, dept.dept_name, pos.position_name, du.duty_name FROM meeting_participant mp JOIN employee empl ON mp.meet_parti_empl_idx=empl.empl_idx JOIN appointment appo ON appo.appo_idx=empl.appolast_idx JOIN department dept ON dept.dept_idx=appo.dept_idx JOIN duty du ON du.duty_idx=appo.duty_idx JOIN position_ pos ON pos.position_idx=appo.position_idx WHERE meet_rent_idx=#{param1}

SELECT DISTINCT mr.room_idx, mr.meet_rent_empl_idx, mr.meet_subject, mr.meet_content, mr.meet_start_date, mr.meet_end_date, FROM meeting_rent mr JOIN meeting_participant mp ON mr.meet_rent_idx = mp.meet_rent_idx WHERE ( (mp.meet_parti_empl_idx = #{meet_parti_empl_idx} AND mr.room_idx = #{room_idx}) OR (mr.meet_rent_empl_idx = #{meet_rent_empl_idx} AND mr.room_idx = #{room_idx}) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_rent(room_idx, meet_rent_empl_idx, meet_subject, meet_content, meet_start_date, meet_end_date) VALUES (#{room_idx}, #{meet_rent_empl_idx}, #{meet_subject}, #{meet_content}, #{meet_start_date}, #{meet_end_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting_rent SET meet_subject = #{meet_subject}, meet_content = #{meet_content}, meet_start_date = #{meet_start_date}, meet_end_date = #{meet_end_date}, room_idx = #{room_idx} WHERE meet_rent_idx = #{meet_rent_idx}
